```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
ITS2 <- read_csv("outputs/no_millet_vouchers_ITS2.csv")

trnL <- read_csv("outputs/no_millet_vouchers_trnL.csv")
```

```{r}
max <- ITS2 %>% 
  summarise(max_reads <- max(Reads))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = ITS2, aes(x = Reads)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  xlim(0, 16000) +
  ylim(0, 200)
```

```{r}
max <- trnL %>% 
  summarise(max_reads <- max(Reads))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = trnL, aes(x = Reads)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  stat_bin(bins = 30) +
  xlim(0, 18000) +
  ylim(0, 200)
```
